abstract.text: Empower people to customize interactions for your app on their device.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: Use intents to enable people to interact with your app across Siri, Shortcuts, and widgets. Define custom intents for specific actions that someone can trigger with Siri or Shortcuts, and donate intents to help Siri learn someone’s habits and suggest relevant shortcuts over time. You can also provide shortcut suggestions that appear in the Shortcuts app or in Siri’s recommendations to help boost discoverability.
